hibernate-mapping.query: select count(Id) from ComponentVersionHeader as cvh where cvh.ReleaseDate <= :today and cvh.InstallerTypeId = :installerTypeId and cvh.Active = true and cvh.CreatedDate > (select cvvh.CreatedDate from ComponentVersionHeader as cvvh where ComponentVersionNo = :currentVersion and InstallerTypeId = :installerTypeId and Active = true)

select Id from ComponentVersionHeader as cvh where cvh.ReleaseDate <= :today and cvh.InstallerTypeId = :installerTypeId and cvh.Active = true and cvh.CreatedDate > (select cvvh.CreatedDate from ComponentVersionHeader as cvvh where cvvh.ComponentVersionNo = :currentVersion and cvvh.InstallerTypeId = :installerTypeId and Active = true) order by cvh.Build desc
select new cmetadata( cvh.Id, cvh.InstallerTypeId, cvh.ComponentVersionNo) from ComponentVersionHeader as cvh where cvh.Id = :id and cvh.Active = true

select new cendto04 ( cvh.Id, cvh.InstallerTypeId, cvh.ComponentVersionNo, cvh.Build ) from ComponentVersionHeader as cvh where cvh.InstallerTypeId = :installertypeid and cvh.Active = true and cvh.ReleaseDate <= :today order by cvh.Build desc

select new manualUpgradeNewVersionDTO( cvh.Id, cvh.Build ) from ComponentVersionHeader as cvh where cvh.ComponentVersionNo = :versionNo and cvh.InstallerTypeId = :installerTypeId and cvh.Active = true

select new ccomdto07 ( cvh.Id, cvh.InstallerTypeId, cvh.ComponentVersionNo, cvh.Build ) from ComponentVersionHeader as cvh where cvh.InstallerTypeId = :installertypeid and cvh.Active = true and cvh.ReleaseDate <= :today order by cvh.Build desc
select new cccomdto05( cvh.ComponentVersionNo, cvh.Build ) from ComponentVersionHeader as cvh where cvh.InstallerTypeId = :installertypeId and cvh.Active = true order by cvh.Build
